page.title: Company for Privacy, Security and Transparency on the Internet
page.description: We are a company who focused on privacy, transparency and security on the internet.

homepage.title: Protect your privacy
homepage.description: Stop looking for excuses - take security into your own hands

covered.description: The software Slynite provides you is engineered with privacy, security and transparency in mind. We optimize data architectures and data models to deliver next level solutions, requiring only the most necessary data.

mission.description_part1: We want to provide what others are lacking - privacy focused software. The software is developed mostly open source to guarantee transparency. Based on our core values, all projects are developed and build from scratch.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We regard privacy as an essential principle in software to protect and secure our users' personal data and information.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: To promote trust and give users insight into our development processes as well as data, we place great emphasis on transparency. We also publish many of our projects open source.

security.title: Security
security.description: We use both best-practice principles and modern security solutions to ensure and continuously improve the security of our software.

tracking.title: No unnecessary tracking
tracking.description: In our projects, we always make sure to only collect necessary data from our users. We also do not use any tracking technologies.

open_source.subtitle: So everyone can be a part of the development team
open_source.description: We use GitHub to develop and publish our projects. We use this platform to ensure transparency and provide an opportunity for everyone to get involved in the development process.

contact.page_description: Contact us today and we will get back to you as soon as possible
contact.title: ͘Get in touch with
contact.description: Would you like to learn more about us? Just let us know! Any feedback is appreciated. Got any issues? Contact us.

video_call.title: Remote Meeting
video_call.description: We will be happy to answer all your questions in a personal video call.
video_call.form_subject: Request for a personal remote meeting
video_call.form_message: I would like to schedule a remote meeting. It is most convenient for me on {DATE} at {TIME}. From my side, {PERSONS NUMBER} people will attend.

email.title: Mail
email.description: Write us an email to hello@slynite.com. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

form.subject: Subject
form.subject_placeholder: What do you want to share with us?
form.privacy_notice: By using this contact form, you allow us to store your email address and the content of this message for contact purposes. More about this in the
form.error: An error occured. Please send us an email to hello@slynite.com. Details:
form.warning: You're message was sent, but an error occured. Details:
form.success_description: Your message has been successfully sent to us. You will receive a copy of your message in the next few minutes.

projects.page_description: Explore our portfolio of projects that we develop and deliver
projects.title: Our projects are
projects.description: Explore our portfolio of projects that we develop and deliver

worktime_tracker.title: Worktime Tracker
worktime_tracker.description: Tracking working hours has never been so simple. With the Worktime Tracker from Slynite, it's easy to record, categorize and analyze working hours. Best of all, Worktime Tracker is and will always be free to use.

activehq.title: ActiveHQ
activehq.description: The HR department in your internal cloud. Take care of and manage everything that concerns employees in a single application. Self-service for employees and HR department.

travelventures.title: Travelventures
travelventures.description: Find the closest locations and tips for your next adventure. Travelventures is the ultimate travel companion, planner and guide in your pocket.

cmp.title: Coworking Management Platform
cmp.description: The Coworking Management Platform (CMP for short) is a booking and management solution for coworking space providers.

opensource.title: Open Source
opensource.description: At Slynite we develop many projects open source. Have a look at what we are doing.

about.page_description: Learn more about what Slynite do and why we do it.
about.title: as foundation
about.description: We want to change what's wrong with many products, so we take user data seriously

who_we_are.description_part1: One of our biggest security issues in today's world is the misuse of personalized data. We do, what many others deliberately do not - we optimize data architectures and data models to ensure the use of only the most necessary data.
who_we_are.description_part2: Due to our privacy driven strict data limitations and transparency it's possible to thrive on powerful applications with a minimal amount of data collection.

timeline.title: First vision of Slynite
timeline.description: Our founder Danny Schapeit starts developing projects under the name Slynite.

timeline.title: Travelventures
timeline.description: Idea and first prototype of Travelventures was born.

timeline.title: New Co-Founder
timeline.description: Jan Luca Sterta joins Slynite as Co-Founder in management.

timeline.title: Worktime Tracker
timeline.description: Based on a side project by Danny Schapeit and Jonas Bott, “Worktime Tracker” will be further developed under Slynite.

timeline.title: New Co-Founder
timeline.description: Jonas Bott joins Slynite as Co-Founder in development.

quote.text: I am proud to have a team of highly competent, excited and helpful professionals who are passionate about our vision. Together, we set new standards and create innovations that captivate our customers.

team.title: Amazing Team
team.description: Our team forms Slynite. Why not get to know the developers, thinkers, designers & philosophers to understand why you are here?

open_source.title: We are Open Source
open_source.description: We develop many of our projects and tools open source. With the help of thousands of open-source developers all over the world, we can provide great software to improve people's everyday lives.

get_in_touch.title: Get in touch
get_in_touch.description: We would love to hear from you. You have questions about us or our projects? Don't hesitate to contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to get in touch with you.

not_found.title: The page you are looking for could not be found
